Sentencas: ABO(2)-type perovskite materials have been wide applied in solid oxide fuel cells and gas sensors.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: SrFeO2 with P4/mmm structure exhibiting an unparalleled FeO4 square-planar coordination structure.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: We have investigated the Sr-site substitution effect on the electronic conductivity of the perovskite-type structure of (Sr1-xCax)FeO2 and (Sr1-xBax)FeO2 (x = 0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75) by using first-principle calculations.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: Six kinds of doping form have been considered for the Ca-site and Ba-site, respectively.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The different doping concentration and position lead to change in crystal structure and electronic properties.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: When x = 0.5, alpha and beta doping structures display Pmmm symmetry, while gamma and delta doping structures show P4/mmm symmetry.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The band structure and density of states reveal that different doping concentration and position can make the electronic conductivity change from semiconductor to semi-metallic.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: When x = 0.25, 0.75, 0.5 for gamma and delta doping, the doped system were semi-metallic properties.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: Whereas, when x = 0.5 for alpha and beta doping, the doped system were semiconductor properties.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: Further, doping can lead to an increase of the magnetic moments.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: It is worth noting that the Ca-doped system has higher growth in the magnetic moments compare with the Ba-doped system.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study

Sentencas: This work provides a new route for the potential application in electrochemistry devices.
Titulo: Electronic properties of SrFeO2 doped by Ca and Ba: A first-principles study
